mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (store_id, store_img, store_address, store_phone, category, parking, opentime, closetime, dayoff, store_name, id, menu1, price1, menu2, price2, menu3, price3) VALUES (#{store_id}, #{store_img}, #{store_address}, #{store_phone}, #{category}, #{parking}, #{opentime}, #{closetime}, #{dayoff}, #{store_name}, #{id}, #{menu1}, #{price1}, #{menu2}, #{price2}, #{menu3}, #{price3})
mapper.select: SELECT store_id, store_img, store_address, store_phone, category, parking, opentime, closetime, dayoff, store_name, score_avg FROM store WHERE id=#{value}
